name: Mariner's Dye
flavorText: Officers of vessels navigating the Skovos Isles wear deep blue garments to indicate seniority.
flavorTextHtml: Officers of vessels navigating the Skovos Isles wear deep blue garments to indicate seniority.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
